text:
In addition to the circumstances described above, we may utilize the data for some statistical or other representational purposes without any disclosure of your personal data.
These legal bases depend on the services you use and how you use them, meaning we collect and use your information only where: we need to process your data to comply with a legal obligation.
We may collect, hold, Use and disclose information for the following purposes, and personal information will not be further processed in a manner that is incompatible with these purposes:
We use "cookies" to collect information about you and your activity across our site.
When you update the information, we usually keep a copy of the prior version for our records.
If you believe that we have breached a relevant data protection law and wish to make a complaint, please contact us using the details below and provide us with full details of the alleged breach.

We collect and process information about you only where we have legal bases for doing so.
We may need to disclose information about you when required by law or legal process or if we have a good faith belief that disclosure is reasonably necessary to
We use "cookies" to collect information about you and your activity across our site.

We may/will monitor the Use of the Services by all of our customers and use the information gathered in an aggregate and anonymous manner.
You agree that we may use and publish such information, provided that such information does not incorporate any of Your Data in a personally identifiable manner.

We use the other information that we collect for such purposes as counting and recognizing visitors to the site; analyzing how visitors use the site and various site features; improving the site and enhancing users' experiences with the site; creating new products and services, or improving our existing products and services; enabling additional website analytics and research concerning the site, and managing our business.
b) We use the information we collect in various ways, including to:

data_type: personal information we hold about you
text:
You may also request that we transfer this personal information to another third party.
You may request that we erase the personal information we hold about you at any time.

data_type: personal information we hold about you
text:
Where possible, we will provide this information in CSV format or other easily readable machine formats.
You may also request that we transfer this personal information to another third party.
You may request a copy of the personal information we hold about you.
You may request that we erase the personal information we hold about you at any time.
